#summary Sample Application: K-Means
#labels Type-SampleApps

= Color clustering sample application = 

 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-machinelearning-kmeans-bin.zip application]
 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-machinelearning-kmeans-src.zip source code]
 * Browse the [https://code.google.com/p/accord/source/browse/trunk#trunk%2FSamples%2FMachineLearning%2FKMeans source code online]

<br />
This sample application shows how to use the [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_MachineLearning_KMeans.htm K-Means clustering algorithm] and the [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_MachineLearning_MeanShift.htm mean shift clustering algorithm] to perform [http://crsouza.blogspot.com.br/2010/10/k-means-clustering.html color clustering], reducing the number of distinct colors in a given image.
